entry.title: Sunday: Overcast. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
